description: Try our easy to follow Salted-Caramel Hot Choc recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot chocolate,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Chocolate,Sesame free
name: Salted-Caramel Hot Choc Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Warm salted caramel sauce and swirl half of it around the inside of a glass to coat. Place dark chocolate, chopped, into base of the glass. Heat milk in a saucepan until it just comes to the boil. Pour milk into glass over chocolate. Stir well to melt chocolate. Top with whipped cream and drizzle with remaining salted caramel sauce.
